H0.text: How many BTU’s  (British Thermal Units) in one therm. 50000

H1.text: How many BTU’s  (British Thermal Units) in one therm. 200000

H2.text: How many BTU’s  (British Thermal Units) in one therm. 150000

H3.text: How many BTU’s  (British Thermal Units) in one therm. 100000

A5.text: 1 therm is defined in the United States as 100,000 Btu using the Btu59 °F definition.

A6.text: The unit 'therm' is used to represent 100,000 Btu.
